publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4283 Dave Thompson: Congratulations to Karen Gillan—That the Parliament congratulates Karen Gillan on securing her role in the much-loved BBC series, Doctor Who; notes the wealth of talent that Scotland has in the drama industry; believes that it is important that young Scottish talent is supported, encouraged and given the recognition it deserves, and wishes Karen the best of luck in the future. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Bill Wilson*, Jamie McGrigor*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-4283 Congratulations to Karen Gillan (lodged on 1 June 2009) Gil Paterson*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-4283 Congratulations to Karen Gillan (lodged on 1 June 2009) Bill Kidd*, Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-4283 Dave Thompson: Congratulations to Karen Gillan—That the Parliament congratulates Karen Gillan on securing her role in the much-loved BBC series, Doctor Who; notes the wealth of talent that Scotland has in the drama industry; believes that it is important that young Scottish talent is supported, encouraged and given the recognition it deserves, and wishes Karen the best of luck in the future. Supported by: Bob Doris, Bill Wilson, Jamie McGrigor, Christina McKelvie, Gil Paterson, Stuart McMillan, Bill Kidd, Jamie Hepburn
S3M-4283 Congratulations to Karen Gillan (lodged on 1 June 2009) Michael Matheson*
S3M-4283 Congratulations to Karen Gillan (lodged on 1 June 2009) Peter Peacock*
